reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 325/03: DISSOLUTION OF CIAR FOUNDATION
reg_info.act_under: Crown Foundations Act, 1996   Loi de 1996 sur les fondations de la Couronne

content.content: 1. The crown foundation established by order of the Lieutenant Governor in Council under section 2 of the Act and known as the “CIAR” foundation is hereby dissolved. O. Reg. 325/03, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The crown foundation established by order of the Lieutenant Governor in Council under section 2 of the Act and known as the “CIAR” foundation is hereby dissolved. O. Reg. 325/03, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Upon the dissolution of the “CIAR” foundation under section 1, the assets of the foundation become the assets of the Canadian Institute for Advanced Research. O. Reg. 325/03, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Upon the dissolution of the “CIAR” foundation under section 1, the assets of the foundation become the assets of the Canadian Institute for Advanced Research. O. Reg. 325/03, s. 2.
